title: Forms
context: PART II. SPECIAL PROVISIONS ยง421C-11 Forms. The department of commerce and consumer affairs may prescribe and furnish on request forms for documents required or permitted to be filed by this chapter. The director of commerce and consumer affairs may require that the use of these forms be mandatory. [L 1982, c 97, pt of ยง2 and c 204, ยง8; am L 2003, c 124, ยง45]
